entry.title: WINTER STORM WARNING , Schefferville
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:26 PM EST Sunday 05 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -12.1°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Schefferville Airport 4:00 PM EST Sunday 05 March 2023
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: -12.1°C
Pressure: 101.6 kPa
Visibility: 1.6 km
Humidity: 88 %
Wind Chill: -22
Dewpoint: -13.7°C
Wind: NNW 26 km/h gust 41 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Sunday night: Snow at times heavy and blowing snow. Low minus 13.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy and blowing snow. Amount 15 cm. Wind north 40 km/h gusting to 60. Low minus 13. Wind chill minus 25 this evening and minus 20 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Sunday 05 March 2023

entry.title: Monday: Snow. High plus 1.
entry.summary: Snow. Local blowing snow in the morning. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind north 30 km/h gusting to 50. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 20 in the morning. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Sunday 05 March 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 1.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Wind northeast 20 km/h becoming light near midnight. Low minus 1. Wind chill minus 7 in the evening. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Sunday 05 March 2023
